atk-s0401a4:1: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame adantanti savisevanaṃ adantahatthiassādisadisaṃ. Cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva.
atk-s0401a4:2: 32. Dutiye dantanti nibbisevanaṃ dantahatthiassādisadisaṃ. Imasmimpi suttadvaye vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva kathitaṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresupīti.
atk-s0401a4:5: 35-36. Pañcamachaṭṭhāni arakkhitaṃ rakkhitanti padavasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttāni. Attho panettha purimasadisoyeva.
atk-s0401a4:6: 37-38. Sattamaṭṭhamesupi eseva nayo. Upamā panettha asaṃvutagharadvārādivasena veditabbā.
atk-s0401a4:7: 39-40. Navamadasamāni catūhipi padehi yojetvā vuttāni. Imasmimpi vagge vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
